name: Taxi Outbounds
description:
Outbounds Taxi is a dynamic game about the life of a crazy cab driver. Collect your clients, and try not to die! This game was made for LD49 gamejam

Controls - WASD

Authors:

Programming - https://gishadev.com/

Graphics - https://itch.io/profile/holubenko

Music - https://itch.io/profile/t3rd1x, https://youtube.com/c/Terdix

This is submission for ld-49
